channel.title: Auto Cast
channel.description:
Hey, i've been looking at a tut for auto casting. Changing it round a bit, and it' doesn't seem to be working.. So i tried to make one of my own, using the for loop, and a delay.. [code] for(int magic = 500; magic > 500; magic -= 1) { [/code]
Then all the delays, and timers..
[code] AutoCasta = 6; actionTimer = 10; [/code]
Also.. [code] stillgfx(AutoGfx, EnemyX, EnemyY); [/code]
And a bit more etc..
No errors. And when i add the stuff needed, into the cases. And call the method, it just attacks like normal..
I know im probably well off.. But could someone help me out here plz?
EDIT: These stuff are not in correct order. And there is more stuff.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2007, 02:48:40 PM[/size][hr]6TH page, and not 1 reply, please, c'mon..?

item.title: Auto Cast
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Uhh, daarn, i added that, and it only works when i click the spell (CASE)…

And i’ve added a for loop :D… Lol.

Could someone give me a loop, that would work on this?.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Cast
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“redrover, post:9, topic:155648”] public void IceBarrage(){ hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); // You might not need this inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(539, 30, 10); actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }
try sumthing like this, Im not sure

http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=10932&highlight=ice+barrage < Link[/quote]

Naw thats not auto ancients. That just makes it so, it attacks with barrage when you attack someone.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Cast
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

    public void IceBarrage(){
	hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); // You might not need this
	inCombat();
	attackPlayersWithin(539, 30, 10);
	actionTimer = 5;
	setAnimation(1979);   
	teleportToX = absX;
	teleportToY = absY;
	}

http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=10932&highlight=ice+barrage < Link

item.title: Auto Cast
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Well, i’ve seen some tuts on the for loop, and something like that is used for cash, that keeps adding the below all the time. So i though, if i made a timer on it, it would keep looping itself untill the magic = 500; has ended. :…

I tried the tut on rune-server, yet it didn’t work.

So i tried to make the cases myself :S… Didn’t work. Lol.

cumescape:

Rof no one replayed, sorry for spam.

If you know your spamming, why post?
